tool_description: Takes a piece of text and detects the language it is written in.
name: Language detection
title: Language detection

api_list.name: Language detection
api_list.description: Detects the language of a piece of text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text encoded with UTF-8. A sample of text. Longer text will give a more accurate result, but only the first 1000 characters are considered.
required_parameters.default: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: The response mode desired. Default: "iso2", other values: "json", "xml", "iso3"
